text: [MUSIC PLAYING]

ANDREW PELOSI: We're a
marketing services company

that brings storytelling
and technology together

to foster health, wealth,
and happiness in the world.

It's about combining
the physical world

with digital technology to
either drive top-line growth

or improve the efficiency
of business operations.

I enrolled in the Digital
Transformation program

because I saw a growing
number of our clients

taking ownership of
strategic transformations
within their organization.

The courses and the content
of the program at Stanford

lined up well to the
real-world challenges
that I'm seeing every day.

This is the first
time I've enrolled
in any type of remote learning.

And I found the variety
of teaching styles

and the combination
of course materials

to be really effective
at keeping me engaged

and really making
it feel similar to
traditional in-person learning.

What motivates me is
seeing the people around me

and the clients that we serve
really grow and flourish.

Success, more often
than not, translates

into happiness, a sense
of accomplishment,
and a sense of fulfillment.

So I'm looking
forward to applying

what I've learned over the
past year to both my company

and to the client organizations
that we have the good fortune
to work with.
[MUSIC PLAYING]
